topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: Systems Administration :: Authentication/Directory :: LDAP

name: An LDIF grep tool that returns records i
short_description: This utility will provide grep-like functionality to return multi-line (record) matches for blank-line deliminated files such as LDIF files used by LDAP.  A match on any line will return all lines from the previous blank line until the following one.
